Package life.threedee.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Tickable
    An interface representing an object that does an action per tick of the game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Consumable
    A consumable in the game.
    Energizer
    An Energizer that can be eaten in the game.
    Game
    The main game class.
    GameUtilities
    A class containing various variables and methods that are used throughout the program.
    Ghost  
    GhostHouseDoor
    The door to the ghost house, which is transparent, but prevents user from entering it.
    GhostPlane
    The graphical element of the side of a ghost.
    HighScore
    A class for interfacing with the High Score board over the Internet.
    Input
    The input class.
    Pellet
    A pellet that can be eaten in the game.
    Player
    A player, extends Camera and has some extra additions to represent the fact that it is part of the game.
    SpecialPointsConsumable
    A Special Points Consumable that can be eaten in the game.
    TunnelPlane
    This is a special kind of plane that there are two instances of, on either side of the map.
